name: Holiday Cactus
description:
Holiday Cactus: A relaxing, plant-friendly gardening game.

Controls
  • Arrows / WASD - Move and control menus
  • Mouse - Select from menus
  • Enter / Space / Left Click- Confirm menu option, and interact with things
  • Backspace / Right Click - Cancel option, close menu, or open inventory menu
How to play:
  1. Don't worry - this is a chill game, you and your plants will be okay, and the game auto-saves whenever it fades to black.
  2. Scavenge and fetch water to get resources (examine the arrow sign).
  3. Empathize with your plants to learn what they need.
  4. Water them and put up shades if they get too much sun. Keep the sun and water gauges around the mid-point.
  5. If they're healthy and fully grown, they may drop ethically sourced fruits.
  6. Rehome the seeds from the fruits. If you rehome enough, new plants might show up.
